title: Coalescing Around Climate: African Nations Leading the Way | RF
summary: The Rockefeller Foundation is leading the way in addressing climate change, with African nations taking a firm stance on their commitments to climate adaptation and mitigation. The recent Africa Climate Summit (ACS2) in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, demonstrated a shared commitment to addressing climate change with African-led solutions. With over 25,000 delegates and $100 billion in climate pledges, attendees showed a strong commitment to climate action.

title: Africa's $50 Billion PLAN to Fight Climate Change by ... - YouTube
summary: Africa has a $50 billion plan to fight climate change by 2030 with 1000 solutions. The plan aims to address the impacts of climate change on the continent. Africa is taking steps to reduce its carbon footprint and transition to renewable energy sources. The plan includes various projects and initiatives to promote sustainable development and reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

title: How AI is Transforming Marketing Campaigns & Project Management
summary: The Turntabl 20s Podcast discusses how AI is transforming marketing campaigns and project management with Afia Gyamera, CEO and Co-Founder of 40 Analytics.
